        public java.lang.Integer extractIntegerSansLocaleNamed(java.lang.String parameterName,
                                                       com.google.gson.JsonElement element,
                                                       java.util.Set<java.lang.String> parametersPassedInRequest)
        Method used to extract integers from unformatted strings. Ex: "1" , "100002" etc Please note that this method does not support extracting Integers from locale specific formatted strings Ex "1,000" etc
        Parameters:
        parameterName -
        element -
        parametersPassedInRequest -
        Returns:
